EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Webinar_Pivotal HD Launch Session 1.Confirmation - session 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for the Exploring Pivotal HD Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) We're glad you can join us.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are looking forward to you joining us for our first installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series.
Event Details:
Date: Thursday, August 1, 2013
Time: 9AM PST
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=669378157&t=a>
Event Number: 669 378 157
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 663 094 741
Add to my calendar <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node %28VM%29 - Session 1.ics>
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <blog.gopivotal.com> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
